plot: A forged 1000 pesos coin travels throughout society, then comes back to the counterfeiter who forged it and finally unveils his plans to cheat at a cockfight gamble.
title: 1000 pesos colombianos
plot_es: A forged 1000 pesos coin travels throughout society, then comes back to the counterfeiter who forged it and finally unveils his plans to cheat at a cockfight gamble.
plot_en: A forged 1000 pesos coin travels throughout society, then comes back to the counterfeiter who forged it and finally unveils his plans to cheat at a cockfight gamble.
